get.description: The player can either be GMs or not. There can be multiple GMs in a single game
get.summary: Retrieve all players for a specific roll20 game.

parameters.description: Roll20 ID of the game to parse. For link https://app.roll20.net/join/1/59lzQg --> Game ID is "1"
parameters.name: gameId

200.description: Complete list of players for the requested game

207.description: Incomplete list of players for the requested game

400.description: Missing or invalid game ID provided

500.description: Configuration error, either env variables missing or provided roll20 credentials invalid

get.description: This is a mandatory step for every other request, as the bot account won't have access to a game before joining it
get.summary: Makes the bot account join the game as a player

parameters.description: Roll20 ID of the game to parse. For link https://app.roll20.net/join/1/59lzQg --> Game ID is "1"
parameters.name: gameId

parameters.description: Roll20 Code to join the game. This is usually the last part of the join link. For link https://app.roll20.net/join/1/59lzQg --> Join code is "59lzQg"
parameters.name: gameCode

400.description: Missing or invalid game ID or gameCode provided

500.description: Configuration error, either env variables missing or provided roll20 credentials invalid

avatarUrl.description: This player avatar URl. Can either be on roll20 CDN or external

isGm.description:
Is the player a GM of the parsed game
There can be multiple GMs for a single game

username.description: This player username (not character name in game, roll20 username)
